verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: said] [ARGM-TMP: Friday] [ARG1: a date and place have been set for his summit with North Korean leader Kim Jong Un and will be announced soon] .
President Donald Trump said Friday a date and place [V: have] been set for his summit with North Korean leader Kim Jong Un and will be announced soon .
President Donald Trump said Friday a date and place have [V: been] set for his summit with North Korean leader Kim Jong Un and will be announced soon .
President Donald Trump said Friday [ARG1: a date and place] have been [V: set] [ARGM-PRP: for his summit with North Korean leader Kim Jong Un] and will be announced soon .
President Donald Trump said Friday a date and place have been set for his summit with North Korean leader Kim Jong Un and [V: will] be announced soon .
President Donald Trump said Friday a date and place have been set for his summit with North Korean leader Kim Jong Un and will [V: be] announced soon .
President Donald Trump said Friday [ARG1: a date and place] have been set for his summit with North Korean leader Kim Jong Un and [ARGM-MOD: will] be [V: announced] [ARGM-TMP: soon] .
